title: Harmony in music
brief_description: Elementary students in a school ensemble and in a chorus learn how harmony enriches music. The music leader demonstrates the relationship of harmony to chords, explains how chords are built, and how harmony enhances melody and rhythm. The principles of harmony and chords are demonstrated on an actual piano keyboard, with charts, with instruments and with group singing.
